data.meanings: overcame, conquered, subdued, mastered, surpassed, superior in power or force
data.sentence: The word الْغَالِبُونَ comes from the root غ ل ب and is associated with the meanings: overcame, conquered, subdued, mastered, surpassed, superior in power or force

data.meanings: Collect or assemble [armies, military forces], prepare an army, Jundun [collected body of men prepared for war; auxiliaries].
data.sentence: The word جُنْدَنَا comes from the root ج ن د and is associated with the meanings: Collect or assemble [armies, military forces], prepare an army, Jundun [collected body of men prepared for war; auxiliaries].
